channel.title: virtualvenv on Jinwang Blog
channel.description: Recent content in virtualvenv on Jinwang Blog

item.title: 使用virtualvenv创建spider虚拟环境记录
item.description: 使用virtualvenv创建spider虚拟环境记录 创建虚拟环境 virtualvenv --no-site-packages venvSpider jinwang@Jin-Wang-MacBook-Pro  ~/Desktop/Lets_coding/Spider  virtualenv --no-site-packages venvSpider Using base prefix '/Users/jinwang/anaconda3' New python executable in /Users/jinwang/Desktop/Lets_coding/Spider/venvSpider/bin/python Installing setuptools, pip, wheel...done. 激活虚拟环境 source venvSpider/bin/activate jinwang@Jin-Wang-MacBook-Pro  ~/Desktop/Lets_coding/Spider  source venvSpider/bin/activate (venvSpider) jinwang@Jin-Wang-MacBook-Pro  ~/Desktop/Lets_coding/Spider  看到前面的(venvSpider)表示我们已经进入到了虚拟环境中 安装包 查看当前包信息 pip list (venvSpider) ✘ jinwang@Jin-Wang-MacBook-Pro  ~/Desktop/Lets_coding/Spider  pip list Package Version ---------- ------- pip 20.0.2 setuptools 45.1.0 wheel 0.34.2 安装jupyter notebook (venvSpider) jinwang@Jin-Wang-MacBook-Pro  ~/Desktop/Lets_coding/Spider  pip install jupyter Looking in indexes: http://pypi.
